title: If Skarner flashes with Hexflash, he can't use his flash (or hexflash) for the rest of the game
body:
Pictures (thanks to Tempax on r/SkarnerMains): https://imgur.com/a/0Z0Ad

After you flash with Hexflash in your runes, your flash (or more specifically, the key your flash in on) is disabled for the rest of the game and is greyed out. You can't cast any summoner spells on that key for the rest of the game.

replies.body:
Hmm...this happened to me as well a few times. It's not as simple as just flashing though, I've flashed plenty of times with it without having problems.

Do you know what else you were doing before it happened?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cogswobble,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Y05sPT6s,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-19T21:52:19.043+0000)
>
> Hmm...this happened to me as well a few times. It's not as simple as just flashing though, I've flashed plenty of times with it without having problems.
> 
> Do you know what else you were doing before it happened?

It happened the first time I flashed when I flash + R'd their midlaner into my deathly grasp of death.

I think anyway, I play a bit of Skarner so I can try some things out in the Practice Tool and see what triggers it. brb

Alright, so I tested quite a few interactions. The bug occurs when I:

-Prepped my flash before ulting someone.
-Flash and then ult someone, without prepping flash beforehand.


The bug does NOT occur when I:

-Hexflash before ulting someone.
-Ulting someone while Hexflash is up.
-Ulting someone when Hexflash is on cooldown.
-Ulting someone right after using Hexflash.
-Using chilling smite on someone while Hexflashing, or chilling smiting them after I Hexflash or flash.
-Flashing before smiting, auto-attacking, Q'ing, or E'ing anyone.

All tests were performed being level 18 with all abilities leveled up, with the No Cooldowns tool being disabled. My rune path for all tests was I111 and S31.
